column1: 136 ^ Sing for us one of the songs of Sion
137 ^ In the sight of the angels I praise thee

column2: thou searches me throughout and knowest me

column1: 139 ^ From the unjust man deliver me

column3: be in the land of the living

column1: 144 ^ Every day I will praise thee
145 ^ I will praise God in my life
146 ^ Let praise be pleasing unto our God
